Subseries IV.B. Membership Applications and Genealogical Proofs
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Loose documents and miscellaneous papers (2 folders)
Loose documents and miscellaneous papers (2 folders)

Includes Somerville birth certificate; Polheim notes; proof of eligibility copy of ancestor Pieter Wyckoff; Mrs. Ashbel Welch letter regarding bible and family bible information, with photographs; lineage of Miss Alice Louis Canoune notes; letter to Mrs. Holbrook in 1907; Philip Peterre Schuyler notes; note regarding Familien Stuyvesant en Bayard; Note regarding Rev. Bogardus.
